tier.item: (20) Api-no yai tig leu mug las I bi-hwen I Ruigbou I
so-3SG take ston e from sea beach PUR-throw Gurigbou
6Ihave no meaning for these names.
Ndon is the Hatam name for what in Indonesian is referred to as 'mountain Arfak', the highest peak of this range.
Ndon # bi-hwen Ndon-a #
Ndon PUR-throw Ndon-CIT
Therefore he took a stone from the beac h to hur l it at Huigbou (this is a mistake), at Ndon, to hur l
it at Ndon .
